text: It is an opportunity to showcase your ideas on an unique and massive platform in the form of well integrated and intriguing presentation.
It strives to explore inquisitiveness of young minds by giving their incredulous ideas.
Send your abstract to texaholicpsgkriya2020@gmail.com on or before 13.02.2020
The short listed candidates would be informed personally through email 15.02.2020
Warp Knitted Fabrics for Technical Textiles
Energy Saving Techniques in Textile Production
A Team should consist of maximum of two members.
Abstracts should contain maximum of one page.
Only participants who qualify in the preliminary abstract submission round shall be eligible for the final presentation.
Qualified candidates are requested to bring along with them the poster.
The decision of the judges and event head shall be treated as final.
Participants are required to bring the bank account details (Bank name, Branch, Account holder name, Account number, IFSC code) for crediting the prize amount.
